# [4-1]片側遵守者

```{r}
set.seed(1)
N <- 1000
N_1 <- 500
G <- c(
  "nc",
  "co"
)
bias <- 0.5

tau_population <- 
  c(1, 2)
```

```{r}
outcome_potential <- 
  1:length(G) %>% 
  purrr::map(
    function(n) {
      df <- 
        tibble::tibble(
          g = G[n],
          y_0 = 
            rnorm(
              N / length(G),
              mean = 0,
              sd = 1
            ),
          y_1 = 
            rnorm(
              N / length(G),
              mean = tau_population[n],
              sd = 1
            ),
          y_z = 
            rnorm(
              N / length(G),
              mean = bias,
              sd = 1
            )
        )
      return(df)
    } 
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::bind_rows()

tau <- 
  outcome_potential %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(g) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    tau = mean(y_1 - y_0)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup()

outcome_potential %>% 
  head() %>% 
  kbl() %>% 
  kable_styling()
```

```{r}
outcome_potential %>% 
  modelsummary::datasummary_skim()
```

```{r}
tau
```

```{r}
data_realized_excluded <- 
  generate_data_noncompliance_oneside(
    outcome_potential = outcome_potential,
    N_1 = N_1,
    seed = 1,
    exclusion = 1
  )

data_realized_excluded %>%

```

処置受取効果$\tilde{\tau}_D$の手計算
```{r}
tau_tilde_d_excluded <-
  data_realized_excluded %>% 
  dplyr::filter(
    z == 1
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    tau =
      sum(d) / 
      length(d)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::pull(tau)

tau_tilde_d_excluded
```

```{r}
tau_tilde_d_included <- 
  data_realized_included %>% 
  dplyr::filter(
    z == 1
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    tau =
      sum(d) / 
      length(d)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::pull(tau)

tau_tilde_d_included
```

回帰分析による$\tilde{\tau}_D$の推定
```{r}
data_realized_excluded %>% 
  lm(
    formula = d ~ z,
    data = .
  ) %>% 
  modelsummary(
    fmt = 6
  )
```

```{r}
data_realized_included %>% 
  lm(
    formula = d ~ z,
    data = .
  ) %>% 
  modelsummary(
    fmt = 6
  )
```

処置割当効果$\tilde{\tau}_Y$の手計算
```{r}
tau_tilde_y_excluded <- 
  data_realized_excluded %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(z) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    y = mean(y)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::summarize(
    tau = 
      sum(y * z) - 
      sum(y * (1 - z))
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::pull(tau)

tau_tilde_y_excluded
```

```{r}
tau_tilde_y_included <- 
  data_realized_included %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(z) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    y = mean(y)
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup() %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(
    tau =
      sum(y * z) -
      sum(y * (1 - z))
  ) %>% 
  dplyr::pull(tau)

tau_tilde_y_included
```

回帰分析による$\tilde{\tau}_Y$の推定

```{r}
data_realized_excluded %>% 
  lm(
    data = .,
    formula = y ~ z
  ) %>% 
  modelsummary(
    fmt = 6
  )
```

```{r}
data_realized_included %>% 
  lm(
    data = .,
    formula = y ~ z
  ) %>% 
  modelsummary(
    fmt = 6
  )
```

局所平均処置効果$\tilde{\tau}_{Y,co} = \tau_{late}$の手計算

```{r}
tau_late_excluded <- 
  tau_tilde_y_excluded /
  tau_tilde_d_excluded

tau_late_excluded
```

```{r}
tau_late_included <- 
  tau_tilde_y_included /
  tau_tilde_d_included

tau_late_included
```
